00001 /* ============================================================================
00002 BODYCLUSTER - represents bodies grouped, based on some proximity measure
00003 Has most basic traits of a body, like posittion, orientation, etc. 
00004 These represent the centroid of the cluster.
00005 
00006 Has an array of elements 'sub' which are essentially just bodies. 
00007 Note: this thing is not hierarchical or recursive: i.e. only only level of sub-clusters
00008 ============================================================================ */
00009 
00010 #if !defined( BODYCLUSTER_H )
00011 #define BODYCLUSTER_H 
00012 #pragma once
00013 
00014 #include "cv.h"    
00015 #include "Body.h"  
00016 #include "SmartPtrArray.h"
00017 #include "SwarmActivityDetectors.h"
00018 
00019 class BodyClusterElement {
00020         public:
00021                 // Attributes
00022                 int id;                     // body ID
00023                 CvPoint3D32f   bot;         // floor position (x and y)
00024                 double         orientation; // orientation angle [0 = looking along X-axis; increasing counter-clockwise to PI, decreasing clockwise to -PI]
00025                 double         dwell;       // dwell state (from 0 to 1)
00026                 BodyClusterElement();
00027                 ~BodyClusterElement();
00028                 BodyClusterElement(const BodyClusterElement& that);
00029                 BodyClusterElement& operator=(const BodyClusterElement& that);
00030                 BodyClusterElement(Body *b);
00031                 BodyClusterElement(int id,      CvPoint3D32f bot, double orientation, double dwell);
00032 };
00033 
00034 class BodyCluster : public BodyClusterElement {
00035         public:
00036                 // Attributes
00037                 SmartPtrArray<BodyClusterElement> sub;          // an array of bodies contained in this cluster
00038 
00039                 BodyCluster(int id,     CvPoint3D32f bot, double orientation, double dwell);
00040                 BodyCluster(const BodyCluster& that);
00041                 BodyCluster(BodyClusterElement* el);
00042                 BodyCluster& operator=(const BodyCluster& that);
00043                 BodyCluster();
00044                 ~BodyCluster();
00045                 BodyCluster(Body *b);
00046                 BodyClusterElement* Find(int id);
00047                 bool In(int id);
00048                 void Add(Body *b);
00049                 void Add(BodyCluster *b);
00050                 void Add(BodyClusterElement *b);
00051                 void Clear();
00052 
00053                 static double ComputeDistance(SmartPtrArray<BodyCluster>& cl, SwarmEventDetector* comp);
00054 };
